caption: Excelente atención -Yael y Jorge -hicimos un pedido desde Bs As a Miami llegó súper bien todo a destino  gracias gracias Pani súper contentos !!!!! Saludos y hasta la Próxima 🤗🤗🤗🤗🤗

(Translated by Google) My toast was burnt, my salty omelette, as was my girlfriend's toast with guacamole, I do not recommend it, it was my first and last time.  (Original) Mi tostada estuvo quemada mi omelette salado, al igual que la tostada con guacamole de mi novia, no lo recomiendo, fue mi primera y última vez.
Valentina, our waitress, was amazing. Food and drinks were excellent.

The design is beautiful and inviting, however, the deserts and the food is subpar. Typical american-style deserts with sugar overload, massive portions and no elegance in taste you find in a regular European bakery. Another disappointment unfortunately.

(Translated by Google) Very exquisite and lovely shop, every detail has been carefully designed, the staff are super friendly, and the food is nice and delicious!  (Original) 非常精緻可愛的店，每一個細節都很認真設計過，店員超級友善，食物好看又好吃！
Very cute Italian-Argentinian pastry spot. Great for a charming and romantic date with a lovely lady.

Went for lunch with my aunt and had a delicious meal. Staff is remarkably patient and kind especially with my elderly aunt. The deserts are out of this world. Can't pick a favorite yet I must visit again before going home in March.
I love his place. The decoration of the place is unique. Great atmosphere and music. The best avocado toast in town!

I love this restaurant! The food, the drinks and the experience was wonderful. I came on Saturday the staff at the restaurant was very helpful and professional. The manger came by a lot and asked if everything was good. Definitely recommend this place and will be coming back soon.
(Translated by Google) Excellent attention !!! Beautiful place all super rich  (Original) Excelente atención !!! Hermoso lugar todo súper rico

So loud that you can’t even hear yourself think ! What a shame that the owner/manager could not decide whether this is a cafe/restaurant or a dance night club. Even our teenagers could not stand the loud music and we had to leave. Shame !

Horrible dinner spot- food and service subpar. It took two hours of waiting for food and we got food before our drinks or water. Filet cooked incorrectly and they took 20 minutes to correct. Entrees were bland overall. Prices high for what you get, by quite a bit.
EXPENSIVE SLOW SERVICE
I love this place because it’s charming, lovely and the food is delicious
The place it’s cool BUT Bad service!
Friendly service. Delicious food. Beautiful place.

(Translated by Google) We are habitue of Pani, both for dinner and for Coffee with delicious cakes! The portions are huge, the flavors different and exotic. Super rich food, good variety for all tastes !! I am a vegetarian and I find a variety of dishes to choose from. The very beautiful decoration makes one feel comfortable and relaxed.  Suoer recommended to have a very pleasant time! Diana  (Original) Somos habitue de Pani, tanto para la cena como para Cafecitos con deliciosas tortas !  Las porciones son enormes , los sabores diferentes y exoticos . La comida super rica, buena variedad para todos  los gustos!! Soy vegetariana y Encuentro  platos variados para elegir.La decoracion muy bonita uno se siente comodo y relajado..  Suoer recomendable para pasar un rato muy agradable ! Diana
(Translated by Google) Super nice quiet but super expensive place and Marshcake is not what it looks like  (Original) El lugar súper lindo tranquilo pero súper caro y Marshcake no es lo que se ve
Food was delicious, the place is amazing, service from Shey was great👍👌
Beautiful place and Delicious Argentinian food

When we noticed that Pani opened a branch in Miami we were thrilled. Pani is our favourite place to have a “merienda” in Buenos Aires and seeing that it was getting closer to our new home was exciting. But then we realized they were making their amazing “pan dulce” (panettone) for Christmas. We bring them to the table every year, so we know them and love them. But this year with the pandemic and my ongoing pregnancy we couldn’t fly back home to be closer to our family. The idea of having this was the perfect way to feel a little bit closer home, we knew we needed to get one!  We live in New York, but the delivery service only reached the Miami area. However, on the other side of the line Agustina figured that something could be done, that Panteones are not like other products that need to be refrigerated to get to the destination in a good shape. Understanding where we were coming from, she captured how important this was for us, and after a lot of effort and time she figured out a way to ship us two of them. We got them quickly and in perfect shape!  It was incredible to feel a little bit closer to home in such difficult moments.  If you happen to be in Miami and can visit this store you need to try everything, but specially the cakes. The Chola, Chocotorta, My Fav and Kat Flora cake are our favourites.  We are really grateful with Agustina and all the people involved who made this posible. We are dreaming about having a Pani here in New York. Please, make our dreams true again! 🤗

This place was recommended by a co-worker. I am so glad I chose to celebrate my birthday there. All the employees were nice, friendly, cordial, and attentive. The atmosphere is very cute bakery with animal theming. The food is delicious and amazing. The food combinations were endless. Their cake slides are unbelievable! This is a great place for lunch brunch, or even special occasions. Make sure you dress nice because you don't want to miss out on the scenic environment for those instagram shots. I will be returning with friends!

(Translated by Google) Nice and cute place !! 📿💍💄💎👜☕ to have a quiet time talk share 0 stresss !! Coffee, dessert, good attention !!  (Original) Lindo y coqueto lugar!! 📿💍💄💎👜☕ para pasar un rato tranquilo conversar compartir 0 stresss!! Cafe, postrecito , buena atencion!!

This Restaurant is original from Argentina. The decoration is beautifil, every single detail counts: the chairs, colors and design so so nice! We went for an afternoon snack and we tried the chocotorta. This is not the traditional Argentinian chocotorta but it does not disappoint. Their recreated version of the chocotorta is delicious, with a lot of flavor, texture, and, also beautiful plate presented as you can see in the picture
Horrible place. Very rude waitress , hostess girl has bacterial conjunctivitis.... Avocado toast was cold and too sweet, I didn’t eat it.
Nice place. Delicious cakes, great drinks. I wish they could have more vegetarian friendly options.

Best brunch ever! Went with some friends for sunday brunch. Service was amaaaazing! Everyone was on top of orders and great customer service. Clean , delicious, original and just magical. AMUST!  Plates are original, different and non stop, 10 course meal. Recomend it to everyone speciallu gals who love to brunch!
100% Super
Overpriced for quality of ingredients. Pretty atmosphere at least.

(Translated by Google) Atmospheric; good dishes; tea, coffee - no complaints; but the waffles that I was served for breakfast were raw inside, unbaked, replaced, and again the waffle was raw inside, replaced again, dry and at the same time with lumps of flour. As a result, they took everything, but did not forget to bring the full bill.  (Original) Атмосферно; хорошая посуда;  чай, кофе - претензий нет; но вот вафли что мне подали на завтрак были сырыми внутри, непропечеными, заменили, и снова вафля сырая внутри, снова заменили, сухая и при этом с комочками муки. По итогу все забрали, но не забыли принести полный счёт.

(Translated by Google) Cake same flavor as Pani Argentina, but there were several failures, we asked only fruit and they brought us a plate full of yogurt as seen in the first photo and a little fruit. The prices are very expensive compared to other places in Miami, a latte 5.50 dollars, the big cup but the coffee was in half a cup, the oreo cake very rich without a doubt 16 dollars, the double espresso 5 dollars. In total we spent 60 dollars for a snack .. I would only return for the quality of the cakes  (Original) Torta mismo sabor que Pani Argentina, pero hubi varias fallas, pedimos solo fruta y nos trajeron un plato lleno de yogurt como se ve en la primer foto y un poco de fruta. Los precios muy caros en comparacion a otros lugares de miami, un latte 5.50 dolares, la tasa grande pero el cafe estaba en m mitad de la taza, la torta oreo muy rica sin duda 16 dolares, el expresso doble 5 dolares. En total gastamos 60 dolares por una merienda.. solo volveria por la calidad de las tortas

(Translated by Google) The pastry is incredible and the coffee is super rich, I love the atmosphere is adorable  (Original) La pastelería es increíble y el café súper rico, me encanta el ambiente es adorable
(Translated by Google) Amazing.  (Original) Espetacular.

(Translated by Google) First-class pastry, exquisite sweets and cakes, passion fruit mousse, I recommend it with a good coffee, the waitresses' attention is divine.First-class cakes, exquisite sweets and cakes, passion fruit mousse, I recommend it with a good coffee, the waitresses 'attention is divine.  (Original) Pastelería de primera, exquisitos dulces y tortas, mouse de maracuya la recomiendo con un buen café, divina la atención de las meseras.First-class cakes, exquisite sweets and cakes, passion fruit mousse, I recommend it with a good coffee, the waitresses' attention is divine.
Cozy french style

BOUGIE & and SUPER girly. Love it! Food is on point!!! Service was also so great. Our waitress Andreina was so helpful and was so helpful with recommendations. Coming back to taste the whole menu!!! The fried ravioli is to die for!! Delish!

A new place opened at Aventura mall which is a famous chain from Argentina. The food is delicious and the cakes are out of this world. You will have a difficult time choosing what to eat. The service was great too and very friendly staff.

The lentil burger was delicious, the empanadillitas  superb..coffee best I have had in a long time!! And the server, Carlos was very knowledgeable of our diet restrictions and super accommodating!!! Will definitely return!!!!
This place is great. Tropcial vibe with banana trees and palms. Food was excellent, had the burger and chicken sandwich. Margarita was awesome! Sever was Santiago, and he did a great job. Thanks!

A sweet treat of an experience! I enjoyed a delightful lunch with tea and it didn't disappoint. The food servings may seem like they're on the small side, but I assure you they are not!  I could hardly finish my meal, and I also noticed others leaving with to-go containers (even those are cute too).  They also have a fair amount of gluten free and vegan items.  The wait staff wear the cutest pastel jumpsuits.  The staff are extremely attentive to service without being annoying.  I told the hostess that I was planning on studying and she made sure to seat me near an outlet.  You can't go wrong with this restaurant. The dining itself is very memorable experience and I plan on taking my mother the next time she visits.

I guess people just come here for the look of the place. If all you want is pretty pictures for IG and you don't care about the actual food, then this is the place for you.  Food was not good and extremely overpriced. I ordered a chicken sandwich ($16). It was overcooked, dry, and insipid. I'd rather have had a chicken sandwich from Chick-fil-A for less than half the price.
Great place for dinner! The short ribs and the filet mignon were amazing!!!

(Translated by Google) All very well as always. The dinner is spectacular and abundant. The place is very nice. Ideal to come to eat something at night!  (Original) Todo muy bien como siempre. La cena espectacular y abundante. El lugar muy lindo ambientado. Ideal para venir a comer algo a la noche!
Great atmosphere and amazing food! Carlos was super nice 👍🏼👏🏼

(Translated by Google) Amazing !! In two days we came twice just to finish tasting the dishes that we found delicious. There is no place like it in Miami. Excellent attention. Very reasonable prices. Save room for dessert ... the specialty of the house.  (Original) Increible !! En dos dias vinimos dos veces solo para terminar de probar los platos que nos parecieron deliciosos. No hay en Miami un lugar igual. Excelente atención. Precios muy razonables. Dejen lugar para el postre...la especialidad de la casa.
Cute place but food was not good and over priced. Desert was good but but not main courses.
Awesome girls place! 🌸 with delicious food and friendly staff!
Great food and amazing service

My family and I went to Pani Restaurant on 11/14/20 to celebrate my daughters 29th ' birthday with a few friends, as soon as you approach the courtyard you are greeted in a very friendly manner, the place was gorgeous inside, like being in a fairytale,  just so happens my granddaughters room has the exact same colors, but most of our waiter Carlos was the best. He was so nice and professional and made us feel so special,  he deserves a raise for his hospitality skills. I  will definitely be back and tell my friends about Pani.

(Translated by Google) Pani a magical place to enjoy with family and friends! We went to celebrate my mom's birthday 🎉🎂🎉 We loved it! We were fascinated by the decoration, presentation and exquisiteness of their dishes, attention from all the staff, especially who attended us, his name is Carlos, very attentive and accommodating! Thank you all and continue to grow your successes !!  (Original) Pani un lugar mágico para disfrutar con familiares y amigos! Fuimos a celebrar el cumpleaños de mi mamá 🎉🎂🎉 Nos encantó! Quedamos fascinadas con la decoracion, presentación y exquisitez de sus platos, atención de todo el personal, en especial quién nos atendió, su nombre es Carlos, muy atento y complaciente! Gracias a todos y continúen cultivando éxitos!!

Nice ambience but the food is awful, we were a party of 6 and all the main dishes were poorly made and very expensive for the poor quality of the ingredients . The dessert was good though, we ordered the chocolate and passion fruit cake to share.  Definitely not coming back, if you don't care about the food and just going to a pretty restaurant this is the place.

(Translated by Google) Incredible place. The environment is beautiful, very well decorated, you can see that everything was chosen with great care and thought in every detail. The menu is super varied, options for a delicious breakfast, lunch or dinner. In addition to a variety of delicious pies. The dishes are well served and the service is great. High recommendation!  (Original) Lugar incrível. O ambiente é lindo super bem decorado, percebe-se que tudo foi escolhido com muito carinho e pensado em cada detalhe. O cardápio é super variado, opções para um delicioso café da manhã, almoço ou jantar. Além de uma variedade de tortas deliciosas. Os pratos são bem servidos e o atendimento é ótimo. High recommendation!
Beautiful place, we had our birthday breakfast and it was more than perfect. The service is amazing and the food was delicious! Thank you David for everything 🤗
Wonderful little gem in Aventura mall! Very unique concept with delicious food and attentive service. Highly recommend.

(Translated by Google) Delicious food, excellent presentation and service. We thank Carlos who served us and recommended delicious dishes!  (Original) Deliciosa comida, excelente presentación y servicio. Agradecemos a Carlos quien nos atendió y recomendó deliciosos platos !
Beautiful, awesome food  super nice staff  definitely going back. Loved it!

Great ambience! One of the best looking spots in Miami. With so many unique menu items I'll definitely have to come back. Staff was very helpful with recommendations. We had the "I veg your pardon" burger and the "once upon a salmon." Definitely recommend!
Amazing food in a great scenario!!
DELICIOUS food, great service! Cannot go wrong. Try this place next time your looking for either lunch or dinner, it will not disappoint.
The best food i ever had it changed my oife for me and my family i defenetly recomend coming here.

Great service, delicious food, and perfect ambiance! We had a great time celebrating our friend birthday. Their cakes and deserts were one of a kind.
Wow. Where do I start. Excellent food selection, specially the cakes to die for. Service on point. Well done.
Pani is delicious !!!!

Best avocado toast ever! Love the deco, the service and the vibes! This place is a MUST Thank you Pani 💕

Not only a beautiful place, but great service and delicious food. If you are looking for an out of the ordinary place to have breakfast, brunch or lunch this is the place for you. I will definitely be coming back.

The ambiance and design are very nice. Salads, pies, desserts, sandwiches and all appetizers that we tried were delicious. Service is great. We saw other entrees being served and cannot wait to go back and try more things. Also looking foward to the opening of the bar, which should be soon.

(Translated by Google) I love this place. The chocotorta here is the best I've ever had !! Recommended !!  (Original) Me encanta este lugar. La chocotorta de aquí es la mejor que he probado !! Recomendado !!
Amazing place!
Best customer service specially JP, the manager!

This wonderful place has been the best thing that has happened to Aventura.  All divine.  The best lemon pie 100% recommended.  the attention is impeccable especially the manger. He is the best ♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️

(Translated by Google) Simply DIVINOO! Excellent attention and exquisite food! makes you want to not leave here! A thousand congratulations!  (Original) Simplemente DIVINOO! Excelente atención y la comida exquisita! dan ganas de no salir de aquiii! Mil felicitacionesss!

The cutest cafe/bakery ever! Every inch of the place is beautiful, nothing like it! Not to add DELICIOUS! Can’t wait to be back! It’s perfect for a girls day, daddy daughter date or when you want to pamper yourself. ♥️

I loooove Aventura. So I was excited to see a new restaurant. When I first walked i was blown away. The design is absolutely incredible. Giraffes holding the chandeliers was the best. They have many options to choose from. I order  the wontons has my appetizer and the Salmon phyllo. Absolutely delicious! Well seasoned and well baked. Great job well done guys! Will be back for desserts!! I was too full but next time I definitely got to try one those cakes I seen on display that had a rainbow theme to it.
Love love love! The food is delicious. Most plates are shareable. The french toast is a must! The decor is gorgeous. And the servers are super attentive and friendly. Highly recommend!
Had a great time! The service was great and the place is extremely cute! Carlos was our waiter and he was very attentive and fast! Its def a 5 star!

The environment is fun and cute.. A fun place for a lunch date with the kids. My daughter really enjoyed the decorations within and theme throughout. The ravioli empanadas were delicious and fresh. The homemade lemonade was good but very tart.

Drove an hour away to try this place. It took forever for the waiter to acknowledge us and take our order. We waited for 45 minutes for the flatbread which was tasteless. We decided to try the Rosa Mary cake it was one of the worst cakes I ever tasted, the cake was raw. Once I asked for the check the waiter let us know that everyone that orders the cake never likes it and they have to take it off their check. Waiter was nice and took the cake off the check, but the overall experience of the food was not pleasant and won’t come back again.

I made a trip to this new restaurant located at the Aventura Mall. My first impression was a bit confusing due to the decorations but after taking the time to review them, I can appreciate the hard work for the theme. Moving on to the food, we had a party of nine people so we decided to try many dishes. Let's start with the Tar- Tar - Tar - Tar which is a Tuna tartar this was incredible, I have never had anything like this before, great taste and flavor.   We also had the Slow-Loved Short Ribs I never seen ribs breakdown like those without any effort they were delicious. Next, we had the Once Upon A Salmon, we ordered two of those and when the plate came out they were identical, a lot of detail to the presentation never mind they were outstanding. We finished with the Pina Colada Mockcake that thing was out of this world. Overall, I highly recommend this restaurant, can't go wrong with nothing, everything we ordered was on point with great service. I'll be back for breakfast next time! Great Job Guys! 10/10

The place is beautiful, the menu is very cheesecake factory. Our server was very nice but our food took more than an our and the manager came and apologize and said it would be comped .Then we come to find out what would be comped is a dessert if we order one..... This one star is for management more than anything. after being there for a while we did not really want to be there even longer eating dessert lol I would have preferred the manager not even acknowledge the mistake if he was not going to do anything about it.
Amazing. Delicious and balance the taste of the cake.  The coffe is a OH MY GOOD. The best. Since I left venezuela, I hadn't tasted coffee as delicious as this one

(Translated by Google) We placed an order of SUPER BREAKFAST PANI STYLE and VERY GOOD! Excellent quality, very rich everything, super abundant and the presentation of everything was very good. They deserve to do super well! Congratulations!  (Original) Hicimos una orden de SUPER BREAKFAST PANI STYLE y MUY BUENO! Excelente calidad, muy rico todo, super abundante y la presentación de todo fue muy buena. Se merecen que les vaya super bien! Felicitaciones!

This beautiful place was amazing me and my wife loved it amazing food amazing service sophie and Arthur awesome people Arthur explain literally the whole menu to us amazing service definitely coming back next weekend loved every bite.

(Translated by Google) Pani is an amazing place. It is full of Magic. To begin with, its decoration is perfect. It is thought out to every minute detail. Then most importantly, the food is delicious, the presentation of each dish is perfect and the menu is extensive. The unmissable desserts. The service and attention is wonderful. Without a doubt it is a place that has come to stay and make history!  (Original) Pani es un lugar increíble. Está lleno de Magia. Para empezar su decoración es perfecta. Está pensado hasta cada mínimo detalle. Luego lo más importante, la comida es deliciosa, la presentación de cada plato es perfecta y el menú es amplio. Los postres imperdibles. El servicio y la atención es maravilloso. Sin dudas es un lugar que ha llegado para quedarse y hacer historia!
Food was not good, we ordered the salmon it was horrible. We also waited for 45 min and the server only came two time to the table. This is only a coffee pastry place, don’t order the food.
I absolutely love this place. Andreina was the best server possible. She recommended us the mushroom risotto with a short rib & an amazing passion fruit cake. The place is absolutely amazing.

This restaurant is a must if you are in Miami ! Definitely The place you want all your IG pics. Make sure you take them before you eat cause you cannot stop eating their amazing food. I tried the hamburger and the passionate cake. To die for! Excellent coffee and service. Super recommended.
A great new addition to the Aventura Mall. You should definitely go and visit this restaurant.  Welcome to Aventura Pani 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻

Uniforms are cute and staff is SUPER nice! Best experience ever.

(Translated by Google) Excellent service and quality of food! Super filling and the dishes are very novel and delicious.  I highly recommend this place, I have been several times already and it never ceases to amaze me. My favorite is puppy’s favorite and orange is the new cake, MUST TRY!  Everything was amazing! Mi favorito es puppy’s favorite y orange is the new cake, MUST TRY!  Todo estuvo increíble!
Simply Panilicious. Try the mushroom risotto and the chocotorta.... sinful.
Unexpected and delicious. Portions are huge, must see to believe. Come hungry!
Absolutely amazing experience!! Delicious food!! Don’t miss the empanabritas (Brie Empanadas) and the Crocakes as starters. Filet Mignon with Blue Cheese sauce really good too.
Perfect place to indulge yourself. Velvety atmosphere, tasty (oh, soo tasty) food, great service and so many desserts I could not decide! Highly recommended
Great food, great service, awesome cakes... what else can I say?
